problem_statement_suffix:
CRITICAL ENVIRONMENT RESTRICTIONS:
- DO NOT run conda install - ToS acceptance is blocked.
- CMake is NOT available - packages requiring compilation will fail.
- DO NOT use vision-language tool with model 'gpt-4o-2024-11-20' - it is invalid.
- xvfb-run may not be available - use Rscript directly if needed.
- For graphics without display: Rscript -e "options(bitmapType='cairo'); source('Main.R')"
- Create output directories first: mkdir -p ../results
